long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sukoon is an Islamic extension. It shows hadiths on daily basis, and date of the hirji calendar. Each day a sahih hadith will be updated on extension from the books of Sahih al-Bukhari, and Sahih Muslim. It is an extension version of Sukoon : an islamic app. Sukoon is a sadka-e-jariya. When the hadith gets updated it is also visible on extension when the browser doesn't have internet access.
